com.octo.android.robospice.request.simple

Class SmallBinaryRequest

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.octo.android.robospice.request.SpiceRequest<InputStream>
      • com.octo.android.robospice.request.simple.BinaryRequest
        • com.octo.android.robospice.request.simple.SmallBinaryRequest
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Comparable<SpiceRequest<InputStream>>

    public class SmallBinaryRequest
extends BinaryRequest
    Downloads small images in size. All data is passed to the listener using memory. This class is meant to help download small images (like thumbnails). If you wish to download bigger documents (or if you don't know the size of your documents), you would be better using BigBinaryRequest.
    Author:
    sni & jva
